Contents:

class api.t4_clinical_api(pool, cr)[source]¶
get_activities(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Return a list of activities :param ids: ids of the activities we want. If empty returns all activities.

get_activities_for_patient(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a list of activities in dictionary format (containing every field from the table) :param patient_id: Postgres ID of the patient to get the activities from. :param activity_type: Type of activity we want. :param start_date: start date to filter. A month from now by default. :param end_date: end date to filter. Now by default.

get_patients(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Return a list of patients in dictionary format (containing every field from the table) :param ids: ids of the patients we want. If empty returns all patients.
